name: music-analyzer
description:
Web application that lets you to make a comparison between music artists.
The comparison is made by parameters that characterize the nature of the artist's music.
All stats are displayed on a Bar Chart.

scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server && npm run build --prefix client

author: Stav Elmashally
